SectionBody.Text: The Governor or the Commissioner of Education, as appropriate, has the authority to terminate all state actions pursuant to ss. 218.50-218.504. Cessation of state action must not occur until the Governor or the Commissioner of Education, as appropriate, has determined that:

Subsection.Text: The local governmental entity, charter school, charter technical career center, or district school board:

Paragraph.Text: Has established and is operating an effective financial accounting and reporting system.
Has resolved the conditions outlined in s. 218.503(1).

Subsection.Text: None of the conditions outlined in s. 218.503(1) exists.
